Mobster's eyes grow large. He taps into Horn Drill's speed, but the ice bla=
st hits him on the left arm, freezing it. Mobster points at his arm, mumbli=
ng to himself.

Mobster: Look! Look! You shall not live after that! Just lo=
ok!

Mobster was oddly enough, left handed. He picked up the blaster with h=
is right hand now, aiming at Necromancer's head and firing, but the shot he=
aded towards Necromancer's shoulder instead...

ault and have a chance of winning. He saw Mobster in the distance, he looke=
d something like the Coyote after a failed attempt to catch the roadrunner.=
 He was to far away to hear the taunting from the giant. The great dragon s=
hrunk down, transforming to bot mode, he was still one of the larger bots o=
n the battlefield but at least now he had a chance to blend in. He raised h=
is weapon and fired a ice blast at Mobster, it looked like the only way to =
fight this battle would be for a dragonto use guerilla tactics.
